0000100101000010 0100010111010111 0 -> sum: 0100111100011001, cout: 0
0110101011011000 0111110001010010 1 -> sum: 1110011100101011, cout: 0
1111100010000110 1000101011111111 1 -> sum: 1000001110000110, cout: 1
1011011101001110 1000010011110000 1 -> sum: 0011110000111111, cout: 1

1010000101100011 0110110111011000 0 -> sum: 0000111100111011, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
